title: Another case of report abuse
body:
I was assigned bot and this duo attacked me and wanted me to go jungle, I couldn't cs due to my "teammate" varus and did poorly in the match. This type of behaviour should not be tolerated.

{{champion:110}} {{champion:63}} 2v1 buddy {{champion:15}}

replies.body:
It's ranked and the bloke either picked the fill or jungle role then tries to force you into the role he was in because he wanted to duo with his buddy. Why didn't he just que for the role he actually wanted which would've avoided all this. Report the idiots.

P.S; Created my own report in support as I don't like seeing this same thing over and over. Been there, experienced it. It sucks.
Let's hope the report works. Generally for trolling behaviour like this, nothing changes.
